fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use a random factional ability.
- Randomize a player’s faction (1-shot)
- Ignite doused players. This ignites players doused by any method. (1-shot)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night phase, you will give the Random faction access to one of the following abilities for that night, which may be used by any member of the Random faction:
- Factional Kill (Basic)
- Factional Kill (Powerful)
- Factional Douse
- Factional Roleblock
- Factional Strike
- Factional Plague
- Players roleblocked by a factional roleblock will be covered in frost.
- If at least one striked player is alive, gain Basic Defense.
- If a player’s faction is randomized, their goal will be randomized to one of the goals currently existing in the game. Their goal cannot remain the same.
